page.title: 09TRANSPORT - A19 Trunk Road
page.content:
Before 1963 the A19 was mostly single carriageway but under the improvement programme begun in that year much of it has been converted to dual carriageway. The improved and realigned road passes through three of the grid squares surveyed by the Brierton School team. Traffic censuses were conducted on May 4 & May 6 1985, at GR453306.
4th MAY 1985. 1100 TO 1200 HOURS Car.Com. Bus.M/cle.Agric. Northbound 396 168 0 0 0 Southbound 362 119 0 0 0
6th MAY 1985. 1430 TO 1530 HOURS Car.Com. Bus. M/cle.Agric. Northbound 271 126 5 0 1 Southbound 341 201 0 0 0
